pkgmetadata.longdescription: Resolution-Optimised SNPs Searcher // This is a R implementation of "Minimum SNPs" software as described in "Price E.P., Inman- Bamber, J., Thiruvenkataswamy, V., Huygens, F and Giffard, P.M." (2007) doi:10.1186/1471-2105-8-278 "Computer-aided identification of polymorphism sets diagnostic for groups of bacterial and viral genetic variants."
